attributes.action: BRING KING RICHARD HOME TO BE BURIED IN YORK MINSTER AS HE WISHED
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, recognizing that it was the intention and wish of King Richard III to be buried in his beloved York, call upon the government to arrange the transfer of King Richard's remains from Leicester to York Minster at the appropriate time with all respect due to the last Plantagenet King of England, who is, to this day, held in great affection and esteem in Yorkshire and throughout the North of England despite the lies and slanders of Tudor propaganda.
